Background : Cupping ancient treatment remedy use many century many part world . In Middle East , Wet cup `` Hijama '' still popular treatment religious background . Despite , still little scientific evidence prove efficacy . Many hijama healer claim observe dramatic improvement Blood pressure control hypertension patient . Not many study support . This study help prove disprove hypothesis . Objectives : - To determine efficacy wet cup blood pressure among high blood pressure patient . - To assess incidence wet cup side effect intervention group . Methods : The study design randomise controlled trial . There intervention group high blood pressure patient perform hijama addition usual management , control group high blood pressure patient receive usual anti-hypertension management . There 4 week follow period . After , data entry , analysis interpretation take place . Hypothesis : Wet cup effect blood pressure adult hypertension patient
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Wet Cupping Blood Pressure Among Hypertension Patients

Males females Grade III Hypertension ( SBP 180 mmHg and/or DBP 110 BP ) . Patients high add risk , accord Saudi Hypertension management guideline .
